com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.tone_analyzer.v3.model

Class ToneAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.model.GenericModel
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.tone_analyzer.v3.model.ToneAnalysis

  • public class ToneAnalysis
extends GenericModel
    Main object containing the result of running Tone Analyzer on a document. It contains both the sentence-level and document-level results.
